draw_segCN.descp: visualize host local genome segmentations, get input of 'get_UCYC'.
draw_segCN._comments: call and draw segments' copy number in local genomic region

UCYCtoLM.descp: merge unit-cycles to local genomic map.
UCYCtoLM._comments: merge unit-cycles to bio-contig, to local map

get_UCYC.descp: get unit-cycles of local genomic map, input of 'UCYCtoLM'.
get_UCYC._comments: get unit-cycles of local map, developed by ChangXu

find_MH._comments: find MH around vInteg, write report and draw vInteg.
